## Opening RStudio

1. Paste a post-it on the top of your laptop screen.
2. If RStudio is installed on your laptop, just open it
3. Otherwise
      a. Open an a connection to the **[IFB cloud](http://cloud.france-bioinformatique.fr/)**.
      b. Enter in your **dashboard** (requires login).
      c. Create a **vDisk** of 5 Gigabases named (for example) *stats-tuto-hd*.
      d. Check that your VM from previous sessions is well shut down.
      e. Create a **New Instance** of type **R statistical computing** named (for example) *stats-tuto-vm*, with the smallest size (*c2.small*), and a the **Persistent disk** *stats-tuto-hd*. 
4. Once you see the RStudio window (snapshot next slides), remove the post-it from the top of your laptop screen.
